Changes the effect of <Color(-34022)>Shoulder Tackle</Color> depending on which <Color(-154)>Fists</Color> status is active.<Color(52258)>Fists of Earth:</Color> Knockback added, range reduced<Color(52258)>Fists of Wind:</Color> Immediate second <Color(-34022)>Tackle</Color>, damage halved<Color(52258)>Fists of Fire:</Color> Increased damage dealt

Allows for immediate execution of <Color(-34022)>Wheeling Thrust</Color> after landing <Color(-34022)>Fang and Claw</Color>, or <Color(-34022)>Fang and Claw</Color> after landing <Color(-34022)>Wheeling Thrust</Color>, increasing potency by 100.

Allows for the strengthening of the gaze of the first brood upon using <Color(-34022)>Mirage Dive</Color> while under the effect of <Color(-154)>Blood of the Dragon</Color>. When the gaze is its strongest (3 units), <Color(-34022)>Geirskogul</Color> will grant you the <Color(-154)>Life of the Dragon</Color> status in place of <Color(-154)>Blood of the Dragon</Color>. While under the effect of <Color(-154)>Life of the Dragon</Color>, <Color(-34022)>Geirskogul</Color> will change to <Color(-34022)>Nastrond</Color>. <Color(-154)>Life of the Dragon</Color> will revert to <Color(-154)>Blood of the Dragon</Color> when duration expires.

Increases <Color(-34022)>Ninki Gauge</Color> by 6 with each auto-attack landed.

Increases <Color(-34022)>Ninki Gauge</Color> by 30 upon successfully landing <Color(-34022)>Mug</Color>.
<Color(-34022)>Venomous Bite</Color> and <Color(-34022)>Windbite</Color> are upgraded to <Color(-34022)>Caustic Bite</Color> and <Color(-34022)>Stormbite</Color> respectively.

Guarantees the trigger of the additional effects for current <Color(-34022)>Mage's Ballad</Color>, <Color(-34022)>Army's Paeon</Color>, and <Color(-34022)>the Wanderer's Minuet</Color> when <Color(-154)>Empyreal Arrow</Color> hits a target.

Upgrades <Color(-34022)>Thunder II</Color> to <Color(-34022)>Thunder IV</Color>.
